description_for_human: Plugin that provides zen quotes in the style of Snoop Dogg.
description_for_model: This plugin returns a zen quote in the style of Snoop Dogg. You can use prompts like 'Give me a zen moment', 'What is something Snoop would say to me right now?', 'I need some Snoop goodness', or 'What would Snoop Dogg say right now?' to get a quote.
